column3: initial number of englacial sink points

column4: 0.05-0.2 m^2/year; calculated from Fyffe et al. (2020)

column5: In dimensionless terms, K/D should range from 1-10 (Karlstrom and Yang, 2016), but they refer to ICE diffusion, not debris
Potentially quite small, ~0.005n, see Karlstrom and Yang (2016)
keep this small to prevent instability
